title: Math Operations
text: Times tell us to multiply and sum tells us to add.
speech: Times tell us to multiply and sum tells us to add.
pacedSpeech: Times tell us to multiply and sum tells us to add.

title: Math Operations
text: Because we are multiplying $$8$$ times the sum, we need parentheses around the sum of $$x$$ and $$y$$, $$x+y$$. This forces us to determine the sum first.
speech: Because we are multiplying  8  times the sum, we need parentheses around the sum of  x  and  y ,  x plus y . This forces us to determine the sum first.

. This forces us to determine the sum first.
